response.original_title: Robert A.M. Stern: 15 Central Park West and the History of the New York Apartment House
response.overview: In this film, Stern explains why apartment buildings of past decades appealed to so many affluent city dwellers and the lessons learned by examining the houses' design and construction.
response.title: Robert A.M. Stern: 15 Central Park West and the History of the New York Apartment House
